name: Escape Purgatory
description:
Set in a limbo realm, this strategic first-person horror game, charges the player with traversing the world while solving puzzles and challenges. With each discovery, collect items, repent your sins, and be freed from evil. Can you survive the wickedness within?

Story mode: You find yourself in a strange dark place with no one around to help. You solve different puzzles and present your findings to repent your sins and become free from evil.

CONTROLS:
WASD = walk
Left click = shoot
Right click = aim
Shift = run
Ctrl = crouch
Q = switch weapons
E = interact.
